full_summary:
### Ressources de Services d'Application pour le Groupe des Services Numériques

#### Déclaration de titres

*   Title French: Ressources de Services d'Application pour le Groupe des Services Numériques
*   Title English: Application Services Resources for the Service & Digital Group
*   Reference Number: cb-502-53377281
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Solicitation Number: T8080-230302
*   Publication Date: February 9, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: February 27, 2024, 14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: February 27,2024
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   UNSPSC: 80101507
*   UNSPSC Description: *Information Technology Consultation Services*

#### Procurement Details

*   Procurement Category: SRV
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFp)
*   Procurement Method: Selective Tendering
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: None
*   Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Contracting Entity: Transport Canada
*   Contracting Entity Address: 330 Sparks Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0N5
*   Contracting Entity Country: Canada

#### Contact Information

*   Contact Person: Tara Golde
*   Contact Email: [sara.gould@tc.gc.ca](mailto:sara.gould@tc.gc.ca)
*   Contact Phone: 506380-5803

#### Attachments

*   The tender notice can be found at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31694/t8080-230302---npp---february-09\ ,2024.pdf.

Transport Canada is seeking qualified consultants for the provision of application services. This procurement is set aside for Indigenous Business under the federal procurement strategy. The tender is open only to suppliers with specific categories and level of experience. The selected contractor will be awarded a one (1) contract with security requirements. Please visit the link above for details and to access the tender notice.
